Polyglot_eval.description: Executes code in a foreign language identified by its ID

Polyglot_eval_file_by_id.description: Executes code in a foreign language from a file, identified by its language ID

Polyglot_eval_file.description: Executes code in a foreign language from a file, automatically determining the language

Polyglot_export.description: Exports a value with a given name to other languages

Polyglot_export_method.description: Exports a method, defined in the top-level object, to other languages

Polyglot_import.description: Imports and returns a value with a given name exported by other languages

Polyglot_import_method.description: Imports a value, which should be IS_EXECUTABLE, with a given name, and defines it in the top-level object

Java_type.description: Returns a Java class object, given its name
